name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
link = #{link,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update rss_manager set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, link = #{link,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, auto_rss = #{autoRss,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, has_error = #{hasError,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_rss_date = #{lastRssDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select
from rss_manager c
where 1=1
and c.id = #{id}
and c.name like concat ('%', #{name},'%')
and c.link like concat ('%', #{link},'%')
